name: Alpha-Ketoglutarate (AKG)

dosage.notes: Calcium alpha-ketoglutarate (Ca-AKG) is most studied form. Rejuvant brand.

keyFindings: Extended lifespan in mice by ~12% (Buck Institute)
Reduced biological age by 8 years in TRIIM-X adjacent study
